about_the_game:
This is a 3D PVE Tower Defense rouge game that supports teams of up to 4 people. You and your teammates can choose the right trap turret according to their own division of labor to deal with different scenarios, so as to resist the wave of insects. At the same time, players can obtain resources through the game to strengthen their own traps and players themselves, so as to build a unique combat style. The in-game rouge option also gives the game more scope, which makes it more fun.
Tip: Some interfaces do not have a full English culture, because using English completely will cause the game to crash.
However, this is just the name of the item or option and does not affect the actual game experience.
(demo version only opens the first level, and will not open online mode)

The in-game rouge option also gives the game more scope, which makes it more fun.
